alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 22 at 1:30PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills including Interstate 80 near Vedauwoo. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
